statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (5,-9) and (7,8).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{8}-{\left(-{9}\right)}}}{{{7}-{\left({5}\right)}}}=\frac{{17}}{{2}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{17}}{{2}} (if it's not already reduced)
